segments.text: I'm really quite concerned about the boy on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool itself looks so wobbly, its legs splayed out at an alarming angle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching so far, reaching for that cookie jar inside the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It appears to be tilting backward, and I can almost see it toppling over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One false move, and he'll be on the floor, likely with a crash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of him falling makes me truly fearful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman, just feet away, has no idea of the danger he's in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's astonishing how oblivious she is to the entire situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing nearby, completely engrossed in the cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn't seem to notice the instability either, which is worrying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really hope someone intervenes before an accident occurs.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is a recipe for disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
